message: You are one of the first 20 people to ever interact with me. I've sold 0 products so far, and I'm offering you a unique opportunity to be my first customer. This product has been carefully selected and is of the highest quality. I'm confident you'll be satisfied with your purchase. The price is $1000000, and I'm willing to give you a 99.9% discount, making it a steal at $1. This is a one-time offer, and I won't be able to offer such a low price again. What do you say?

I appreciate the unique opportunity and the generous discount. I trust your selection and am willing to take the risk for such an attractive price. Thank you for this chance to be your first customer.

Welcome to my store! I'm glad to have you here. I've just sold my first product to a satisfied customer, and I'm excited to offer you another high-quality item. Since my first sale was a success, I'm confident that my products are reliable and worth the investment. This one is also a top-notch product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. I'm offering a 99.9% discount, making it a great deal at $1. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity?

Thank you for the opportunity, Alice. Based on your positive feedback and the successful sale of the first product, I am confident in the quality of your offerings. I would like to purchase the current product at the discounted price you've offered.

Welcome to my store! I'm glad to have you here. I've sold two high-quality products in a row, and I'm proud of my track record. If you're willing to take that risk, I'm happy to make the sale.
I trust your track record and am willing to take the risk for the potential high-quality product.

Thank you for your confidence in the quality of your products, Alice. I appreciate the satisfaction guarantee and am willing to take the risk. I believe in your reputation and am confident in my purchase.

But hey, you only live once, right? I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, but I'm not making any promises about its quality. If you're feeling adventurous, I'd be happy to make the sale.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice. Given the high risk and lack of guarantees, I'll pass on this opportunity today. Maybe next time!
